text:
I'm a student in licence Science de l'Education. I want to become éducateur spécialisé or in work in social.
I'm concerned about people who need help it can be a man exiting prison or a disabled person. These person have a place in our society but unfortunatly, works in social is loosing of worker. I want these people to have what they have the right to have we are in a country where rights are really important however not a lot of things are made for these people. Year after year the governement try little by little to develop those sector of work to improve it.
But, in these jobs I don't want to be on a chair behind a desk, I want to be in the action, this why, for now I want to become éducateur spécialisé, in this work I want to help disabled people in their lives.
However, I also want of this licence to discover more work in social sector, it's possible that at one time I change my mind on the work that I want to do after so those three years of study are also three year of thinking and searching for the job  I want to do after. Before I entered the licence I have talked with éducateur spécialisé or with peope who work in social sector and at each conversation I had the feeling that it's really what I want to do of my life.
